intents.name: greeting
intents.description: Used for friendly or polite opening statements.

intents.name: information_request
intents.description: Used for queries seeking specific information.
examples: What time does the store open?
Where can I find a good restaurant?
Can you tell me the weather forecast?

intents.name: celebration
intents.description: Used for congratulatory or joyful statements.

intents.name: complaint
intents.description: Used to express dissatisfaction or issues.
examples: The product I ordered was defective.
I’m unhappy with the quality of my meal.

intents.name: emotion
intents.description: Used to convey personal emotions or feelings.
examples: I feel anxious about the meeting.

intents.name: draw_request
intents.description: Used for asking the system to create visual content.
examples: Can you draw a mountain landscape?
Please create a sketch of a sunset.
Draw a diagram of the solar system.

intents.name: affirmation
intents.description: Used to express agreement or confirmation.

intents.name: question
intents.description: General questions that don’t fall into specific categories.
